Table: term

Terms that have a specific lexicon and context.

term Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v1()

A globally unique identifier for this term (a UUID).
context.lexicon_identifier#1 lexicon_identifier character varying UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The lexicon associated with this term.
context.identifier#1 context_identifier character varying UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The context associated with this term.
context.version#1 context_version character varying UNIQUE#1 DEFAULT ''::character varying

The version of the context associated with this term (optional).
term character varying UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The term itself.
is_root boolean DEFAULT false

A flag indicating the term is at the top level (eg, no broader term).
description character varying

A description of the term.
url character varying

A url for further information.

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

term_map
term_rel
